sentence: Israel  launched  the  offensive  after  an  unprecedented  cross-border  attack  by  Hamas  on  Oct.  7  that  killed  1,200  people  and  took  some  250  others  hostage.

Israel's  assault,  one  of  the  deadliest  and  most  destructive  military  campaigns  in  recent  history,  has  killed  nearly  25,000  Palestinians,  according  to  Gaza  health  authorities,  caused  widespread  destruction  and  uprooted  over  80%  of  the  territory's  2.
Israel  has  continued  to  strike  what  it  says  are  militant  targets  in  all  parts  of  Gaza,  often  killing  women  and  children.
Early  Thursday,  medics  said  an  Israeli  airstrike  on  a  home  killed  16  people,  half  of  them  children,  in  the  southern  Gaza  town  of  Rafah.

Israel  says  its  forces  have  killed  roughly  9,000  militants,  without  providing  evidence,  and  that  193  of  its  own  soldiers  have  been  killed  since  the  Gaza  ground  offensive  began.
